overview:
Louis Haberman is the Chief Financial Officer of Invoke Solutions.

Louis brings significant experience establishing, managing, and refining financial processes and systems for growth in both publicly traded and venture backed companies to his role at Invoke. Previously, Louis was Vice President, Finance at BuyerZone.com, a B2B lead generation company. He guided Buyerzone.com to profitability and led the companyâ€™s sale to Reed Elsevier. Prior to that, Louis served as the Controller for VideoShare and held positions at SupplierMarket.com, Sun Life Financial and National Linen Service. Louis holds a Bachelor of Arts degree from York University and an MBA from Bentley College.

Source: Invoke Solutions
